hotels.title: Historic Five-Star Camargue South Provence Ranch Retreat
hotels.description: Escape to a world of wild white horses, black bulls and rosé-coloured flamingos with a stay at the boutique, five-star Le Mas de Peint, offering guests a unique glimpse of ranch life among the wetlands of Camargue, South Provence. Inhabiting a family-owned 18th-century manor house - at the centre of over 1200 rambling acres - that has been lovingly restored and warmly shared, the hotel offers a mesmerising blend of modern design and traditional Camargue hospitality. Indulge in a visit to the relaxation salon, explore the vast wilderness via horseback or visit the acclaimed onsite restaurant, which proudly serves local farm-to-fork delicacies such as red rice, bull's ribs and house-made olive oil.
